author: daniellehrner
content:
I've stumbled upon this PR to block a validator from a relay: https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost-relay/commit/84a943925e62f20b812c60688b6e433fba8e0da7

Do I understand it correctly that the block proposer while only get an error have submitting a signed header if they are blocked? But not when registering or requesting a header?
